description: An overview of contribution templates
---

### Where to edit
#### Writers

<a href="https://markdownlivepreview.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Markdown Live Preview</a>

Copy the changes into a .md (markdown) file, create a post in the <a href="https://discord.gg/fqRBzQWVfK" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Discord</a> and upload the markdown file for review.

#### Website editors

<a href="https://code.visualstudio.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Visual Studio Code</a>

Visit our <a href="https://github.com/is-central/is-central.github.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">GitHub repository</a> to start editing
Alternatively, our contribute guide explains a different option to edit with Netlify.


Here are a collection of templates that you can use when proposing contributions.
